subject: Plus X Racing Pedal Haptics
description_text:
Hi- I'm looking to buy the Plus X Racing pedals with haptics. But do I need
to buy the SPlus X pedal control box too?

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Nick Dodson,  If you have already purchased the PlusX pedals, there is no need to buy an additional control box. You only need to purchase the VAM Pro motor and the power supply separately.Â
